news.title: Jim Cramer explains why the promise of tax cuts could have sent stocks lower on Tuesday
news.content: CNBC's Jim Cramer suggested that if Trump's new tax plans are similar to those he implemented in 2016, wealthy people will stand to benefit the most.

news.title: Don't Look Now, but Dogecoin Is Up Another 20% Today
news.content: Dogecoin is among the top movers in today's crypto market, continuing to ride Donald Trump's (and Elon Musk's) coattails higher.

news.title: Trump Presidency Magnificent 7 Stock Impact: Readers Pick Tech Titan At Most Risk Following 2024 Election - Apple  ( NASDAQ:AAPL ) , Amazon.com  ( NASDAQ:AMZN )
news.content: The stock market and cryptocurrency sector have soared since Donald Trump won the 2024 election with major U.S. stock indexes hitting record highs. While a Trump win could be good for many companies and the overall stock market, there could be plenty of losers including companies that have ...

news.title: Musk Spends $130M - Tesla Gains $344B On Trump Election, Stock Market Focusing On Trump Appointments - Apple  ( NASDAQ:AAPL )
news.content: To gain an edge, this is what you need to know today. Please click here for an enlarged chart of Tesla Inc TSLA. Trump appears to be picking China hawks. As a result, stocks in Hong Kong fell 2.8%. Trump appears to be picking Iran hawks who are very pro-Israel.
